name: glances
description: Glances is a cross-platform system monitoring tool that displays real-time metrics in a TUI or web UI. It monitors CPU, memory, disk, and network metrics and includes a built-in REST API for remote data access.
features: Real-Time Monitoring: Track CPU, memory, disk, network, and process metrics with live updates.
Multiple Interfaces: Access via terminal UI, web interface, or REST API for flexible monitoring.
Cross-Platform Support: Monitor Linux, macOS, Windows, and BSD systems with a single tool.
Process Management: View detailed process information including CPU and memory usage per process.
Alert System: Configure thresholds and receive alerts when system resources exceed limits.
Export Capabilities: Send metrics to InfluxDB, Prometheus, or other monitoring systems.
Plugin Architecture: Extend functionality with plugins for additional metrics and integrations.
Remote Monitoring: Monitor multiple servers from a central dashboard via client-server mode.
